channel.title: Design on MinuteMedia Tech and Product Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Design on MinuteMedia Tech and Product Blog

item.title: Welcome to Mars! A Beginner's Guide to startups
item.description: Welcome to Mars! A Beginners Guide to Hi-tech So, you got accepted to your dream job in a successful startup company. You passed about 6 interviews, a home assignment (in my case a design assignment), you signed an 11 page contract (in English of course) and now you are about to start working…but wait - do you know what you are actually getting yourself in to?

item.title: DIY: Creating a Great Relationship Between Dev & Design
item.description: A successful relationship between dev & design is key to achieving a good product. However, unfortunately in most places it is not the case. Today in Minute Media, designers and developers are working together in a good and healthy atmosphere - but it took a lot of work to get to this point, and it takes constant work to maintain it.
